Summary._: Northbound [6] trains end at 3 Av-138 St because of a train with mechanical problems at Elder Av.

Description._: Northbound [6] trains end at 3 Av-138 St because of a train with mechanical problems at Elder Av.

LongDescription:
Northbound [6] trains end at 3 Av-138 St because of a train with mechanical problems at Elder Av.

Southbound [6] trains are holding in stations from Pelham Bay Park to Westchester Square-East Tremont Av.

Travel Alternatives: For nearby [6] stations, passengers can utilize nearby Bx4, Bx4A, Bx19, Bx24, Bx36 and Q44-SBS bus service to nearby [2][4][5][D] train stations.

Expect delays in both directions.

Summary._: TRACK MAINTENANCE  [A] Inwood-bound trains run express from Euclid Av to Hoyt Schermerhorn

Description._: TRACK MAINTENANCE  [A] Inwood-bound trains run express from Euclid Av to Hoyt Schermerhorn

LongDescription:
TRACK MAINTENANCE
[A] Inwood-bound trains run express from Euclid Av to Hoyt Schermerhorn

Nights, 10:30 PM Fri to 5 AM Mon, Apr 27 - 30

Trains stop at Broadway Junction, Utica Av and Nostrand Av.

For service to Shepherd, Van Siclen and Liberty Avs, take the [A] to Broadway Junction and transfer to an
Ozone Park/Far Rockaway-bound [A] local.

For service to Rockaway and Ralph Avs, take the [A] to Utica Av and transfer to an
Ozone Park/Far Rockaway-bound [A] local.

For service to Kingston-Throop Avs, Franklin, Clinton-Washington Avs and Lafayette Av, take the [A] to
Hoyt Schermerhorn and transfer to an Ozone Park/Far Rockaway-bound [A] local.

For service from these stations, take the [A] to Utica Av, Broadway Junction or Euclid Av and transfer to an Inwood-bound [A].

Alternate travel note:
Transfer between trains with Unlimited Ride MetroCard at Nostrand Av.

[ad] This service change affects one or more ADA accessible stations. Please call 511 for help with planning
your trip. If you are deaf or hard of hearing, use your preferred relay service provider or the free 711 relay.

STATION IMPROVEMENTS
[B] Service ends early

Evening, beginning 9 PM, Friday, Apr 27

Take the [C] [D] and/or [Q] trains.

• Transfer at 59 St-Columbus Circle [C]* [D], 34 St-Herald Sq [D] [Q] and/or Atlantic Av-Barclays Ctr [Q].

*Please review [C] advisories for additional information that may affect your trip for Apr 27.

[F] No trains between Church Av and Stillwell Av

[SB] Buses operate between Church Av and Stillwell Av*, stopping at Ditmas Av, 18 Av, Avenue I,
Bay Pkwy, Avenue N, Avenue P, Kings Hwy, Avenue U, Avenue X, Neptune Av and W 8 St.

• Transfer between [F] trains and [SB] buses at Church Av.

For direct service between Coney Island and Manhattan/Downtown Brooklyn,
take the [D] [N] or [Q] instead.

• Transfer between [D] [N] [Q] trains and [SB] buses at Stillwell Av.
• Transfer between [Q] trains and [SB] buses at West 8 St.

Summary._: Rockaways Long-Term Flood Protection  [S] No Rockaway Park Shuttle service at Broad Channel - Take the [A] instead [A] No rush hour service  to/from  Rockaway Park-Beach 116 St

Description._: Rockaways Long-Term Flood Protection  [S] No Rockaway Park Shuttle service at Broad Channel - Take the [A] instead [A] No rush hour service  to/from  Rockaway Park-Beach 116 St

LongDescription:
Rockaways Long-Term Flood Protection
[S] No Rockaway Park Shuttle service at Broad Channel - Take the [A] instead
[A] No rush hour service to/from Rockaway Park-Beach 116 St

All times, until Friday May 18, 2018

[S] Rockaway Park Shuttle operates, approximately every 20 minutes, between
Rockaway Park-Beach 116 St and Beach 90 St and via the [A] to/from Far Rockaway-Mott Av.

For Broad Channel, take the [A], transfer to the [S] Rockaway Park Shuttle at Beach 67 St.

Alternate travel note for Broad Channel:
Q52-SBS, Q53-SBS, QM16 and QM17 service is also available at Cross Bay Blvd and Noel Rd.

Click here for additional details on this Flood Protection Project.
